metadata.name: Suspicious Redirection to Local Admin Share
metadata.comment: Detects a suspicious output redirection to the local admins share, this technique is often found in malicious scripts or hacktool stagers

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('>')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\127.0.0.1\\admin$\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\localhost\\admin$\\'))))

output.summary: Detects a suspicious output redirection to the local admins share, this technique is often found in malicious scripts or hacktool stagers
